definition: it goes without saying/it is self-evident
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory

sentences.english: It is important for engineering students to master specialty courses knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 对工科学生而百，专业课的重要性是不言而喻的。

sentences.english: It is understood that Tony is his co-trustee.
sentences.chinese: 不言而喻，托尼也是他的托管人。

sentences.english: More than a twirling wobble is implied.
sentences.chinese: 超过一跳起摆动是不言而喻的。

sentences.english: And it is rarely easy, despite how self-evident it should be.
sentences.chinese: 无论它是怎样不言而喻，它很少时候是简单的。

sentences.english: It is easy to see thabout the people of different cultures haudio-videoe frequently copied every other.
sentences.chinese: 不言而喻，不同文明的人总是相互鉴戒的。

sentences.english: This is Lwin Lwin Htay, clearly joyous over her mother's recovered sight.
sentences.chinese: 伦伦忒看到母亲摆脱黑暗，喜悦不言而喻。

sentences.english: It goes without saying that the fish feast on all the dishes are made with fish.
sentences.chinese: 不言而喻，鱼宴上所有的菜都是用鱼做成的。

sentences.english: It goes without saying that we shall give commendations to any suggestion that will increase efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 对提高效率的建议，我们将予以表扬，这是不言而喻。

sentences.english: Brand for catering enterprises speaking, is very important.
sentences.chinese: 品牌对于餐饮企业而言，重要性不言而喻。

sentences.english: Predictably, the importance of creative advertising is self-evident.
sentences.chinese: 由此可知，创意广告的重要性就不言而喻了。

sentences.english: Modernity is no longer self-evidently here.
sentences.chinese: 这里已经不再具有不言而喻的现代性。

sentences.english: Concerning murals, the picture above speaks for itself.
sentences.chinese: 关于壁画方面，上边图片不言而喻。

sentences.english: It becomes common duty for both central and local government to suppress smuggling.
sentences.chinese: 缉私作为打击走私的政府职能的重要性就不言而喻了。

sentences.english: Be certain that any table or graph is self-explanatory.
sentences.chinese: 确定任何的表格或图表的含义都能不言而喻。

sentences.english: Promote the advantages of operating on the self-evident.
sentences.chinese: 在经营促销上的优势不言而喻。

sentences.english: Tung's current popularity very much speaks for itself.
sentences.chinese: 董建华现时的民望可谓不言而喻。

definition: clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously/clearly/it goes without saying
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
from this, it can be seen that...
it goes to show that/one can see
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
needless to say/it goes without saying
